org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.ui

Class BicycleGeometryWorkshopUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.ui.BicycleGeometryWorkshopUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, ProjectListener, UnitsListener, ComponentOwner, NavigatorListener

    public class BicycleGeometryWorkshopUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements NavigatorListener, ProjectListener, UnitsListener, ComponentOwner
    This is the main UI class. This class manages the Project, Navigator, editor area, Viewer, and Report.

    The UI acts as an intermediary between the Project and the Navigator via the listener class (Navigator and Project listeners). This was done instead of plugging one into the other and allowed for easier integration of the undo mechanism.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
